CHAT.comment: BUCKHANNON BOARD AND CARE HOME, INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. WEST VIRGINIA DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN RESOURCES, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:17 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WEBSTER J. ARCENEAUX, III ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BETH S. BRINKMANN ON BEHALF [*18] OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID P. CLEEK ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF WEBSTER J. ARCENEAUX, III ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:12 a.m. the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
